select goods_id,goods_name,goods_code,purchase,sale,brand,last_sale,consumer_code,consumer_name from (select cg.id as goods_id,cg.name as goods_name,cg.code as goods_code,cg.purchase,cg.sale,cg.brand,table1.cname as consumer_name,table1.ccode as consumer_code from cms_goods as cg, (select name as cname,code as ccode from cms_consumer where id=#{consumer_id}) as table1) as table2 left join (select * from ( select g.id as gid,cd.sale as last_sale from cms_goods g,cms_order cc,cms_order_detail cd where cc.consumer_id=#{consumer_id} and cc.id=cd.order_id and cd.goods_id=g.id order by cc.create_date desc ) as temp group by gid ) as table3 on table2.goods_id=table3.gid
and goods_code like '%${goods_code}%'
and goods_name like '%${goods_name}%'
and not exists (select goods_id from cms_cart,cms_cart_detail where cms_cart.user_id=#{user_id} and cms_cart.id=cms_cart_detail.cart_id and cms_cart_detail.goods_id=table2.goods_id)
limit #{start}, #{limit}

and goods_code like '%${goods_code}%'
and goods_name like '%${goods_name}%'
and not exists (select goods_id from cms_cart,cms_cart_detail where cms_cart.user_id=#{user_id} and cms_cart.id=cms_cart_detail.cart_id and cms_cart_detail.goods_id=table2.goods_id)
